page.title: 02DAY IN LIFE OF Mr L.N.PRICE
page.content: The day begins at 0700 with the TODAY radio programme. I get up about 0710 and make tea for the family. By 0745 I have washed,shaved and changed. Breakfast is cereal, toast and juice. After final preparations I leave at 0820 for the 20 minute drive to work. I work with B.Cal at caledonian house near Gatwick. My work involves planning B.Cal's North American routes. In the morning, I work on reports of route performance and developments, new aircraft proposals and meetings to discuss schedule programmes, budget corrections or estimates of future competitor activity. Lunch is at about 1230: if I have to visit our office in Houston,Texas, I travel to the airport for departure at 1240. Usually after lunch I attend meetings or staff briefings.
